sect1.title: Creating the temporary tools directories
sect1.para: The cross-binutils and cross-compiler built in will be installed under ${CLFS}/cross-tools to keep them separate from the host programs. The programs compiled here are cross-tools and will not be a part of the final CLFS system or the temp-system. Similarly, all programs compiled in will be installed under ${CLFS}/tools to keep them separate from the programs compiled in . This also prevents these programs from ending up in the host production directories (easy to do by accident in ). By keeping the cross-compile tools and temporary-system programs in separate directories, they can easily be discarded later after their use.
